info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 17 at 3:58PM CST until December 17 at 4:45PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Jefferson County in southern Oklahoma... Southeastern Stephens County in southern Oklahoma... Northeastern Clay County in northern Texas... * Until 445 PM CST. * At 358 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sugden, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waurika, Loco, Addington and Sugden. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
